attributes.action: Make the requirements for purchasing a Radar key to be such, that proof of disability/illness is required, before the Radar key is issued.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We, the undersigned, want Radar keys ONLY available for the disabled.  We want proof of disability to be asked for, when a person wishes to purchase a Radar key.  Proof of disability is needed when applying for a Disabled Freedom Bus Pass or Blue Badge.

RADAR and most local Council's will sell these keys to anyone willing to pay for them. The only time you need to prove disability, is if you are entitled to and wish to be VAT exempt.

Some Council’s require proof of disability, before issuing a RADAR key, Radar & others do not.  We want ALL Council’s and Radar to require proof of disability.

RADAR and many Council's state, that these keys are provided, to prevent vandalism and MISUSE.  Allowing NON disabled people to purchase/posses these keys, is a form of misuse.

NON disabled people possessing a Radar key, have a choice when needing the toilet.  Men’s, Women’s (normally only a few feet from a disabled toilet) and DISABLED toilets.  

Disabled people only have ONE choice, DISABLED toilets.
